creator: surendra.konna@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 31845
httpd 2.2 conf file

I am configuring Jboss 7 with clustering in domain mode.
I want to install httpd 2.4 and configure mod cluster.

I can't able to configure ManagerBalancerName,ServerAdvertise, EnableMCPMReceive even after copying the respected .so files


Can you please provide example to configure httpd 2.4 in win32

creator: trawick@apache.org
text:
mod_cluster is not supported here.

Additionally, the bug db is not for configuration assistance.

Look somewhere in JBoss land for an appropriate venu.
